txt.en: You have been tasked with destroying the Angmarim ritual at Dûn Traikh.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from Dûn Traikh. They have seen a terrible ritual taking place within the Angmarim fortress. Had my scouts more time, they would have disrupted the Angmarim there. Instead, they came across three fell spirits that prevented them from getting closer.

'Dûn Traikh is a deadly fortress and is not a place to tread lightly!'

'Far from Angmar, upon the Gates of Gundabad, the Iron Crown keep watch over Elderslade as they seek to hold on to power in Gundabad….\n\n'Your mission is to destroy the Angmarim ritual at Dûn Traikh.'
At low health, monsters in this mission will attempt to end their own life to damage and apply a fear effect to those nearby.
Your mission is to destroy the Angmarim ritual at Dûn Traikh.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Dûn Traikh.
'Well done! With the ritual destroyed, we should be able to launch another assault against Dûn Traikh soon enough!'
